nodes.text: A carnage beret was a ceremonial head covering worn by the Nightsisters of Dathomir. Various Sisters were known to have worn this, including Baritha, Kimaru and Morathax.
The beret was made of Dathomirian wood, crystalline gemstones, synthetic cloth and bird bones.

The carnage beret was a headgear item in Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided. It was made from a schematic which could be looted from Axkva Min in the Chamber of Banishment. The schematic could be learned and made by a Domestic Goods Trader.
